sentences.cn: 他带了一把子弹上膛的枪。

sentences.en: He loaded his vessel with another cargo and set sail.
sentences.cn: 他给自己的船装上另一批货后便启航了。

sentences.en: Mr. Dambar had loaded his plate with stuffed flounder.
sentences.cn: 但拔先生的餐盘里盛满了填馅的比目鱼。

sentences.en: She loaded me down with around a dozen cassettes.
She loaded up his collection of vintage wines into crates.
sentences.cn: 她把他收藏的陈年佳酿装进板条箱里。

sentences.en: Soldiers were loaded with blankets and supplies.
sentences.cn: 士兵们背着毯子和给养。

sentences.en: The article was heavily loaded against Morrissey.
sentences.cn: 文章对莫里西非常不利。

sentences.en: The giggling couple loaded up their red sports car and drove off.
sentences.cn: 笑咧咧的夫妻把东西装上他们的红色跑车后疾驰而去。

sentences.en: The phrase is loaded with irony.
The President's visit is loaded with symbolic significance.
sentences.cn: 总统之行充满象征性意义。

sentences.en: They had come up from London loaded down with six suitcases.
sentences.cn: 他们拖着6只箱子从伦敦过来。

sentences.en: They were loaded on the railway trucks to go to Liverpool.
sentences.cn: 它们被装上开往利物浦的货运火车。

sentences.en: They were quite safe because they weren't loaded.
sentences.cn: 它们挺安全的，因为都没上子弹。

words.tran_cn: 负载，负荷；工作量；装载量
装货的人；载入程序；装货设备；装填器
装载，装填，担负（load的ing形式）； 装入
负荷的；装填子弹的；装好胶卷的；喝醉了的（美国俚语）；阔绰的（美国俚语）

trans.tran_cn: 载重的，有负荷的，充满…的，〈美俚〉喝醉了的，〈美俚〉富有的
把…装上车[船]( load的过去式)，装…
